name: required_standards
description: Required standard documents for the app. Each is recorded for its entirety as the canonical source. Other improvising standards will be added here.
recorded_for_entirety_note: Each listed file is the full record of its standard; the entire document is authoritative.

required.name: Tempo fixation and standard of record for beats
required.description: Fixation of tempo on the beats; BPM as single source for time↔beat; canonical equations; re-fixation.

required.name: Improvising standards (umbrella)
required.description: Scope of improvising standards; required documents; recorded for their entireties.

required.name: Timeline — Solver — Dispatcher — Event Manager (formal spec)
required.description: Formal spec: Timeline, Solver, Dispatcher, Event Manager; over an analyzed sample.

required.name: Dispatcher equation (graph)
required.description: Collection solver; one-frame equation; quad stream over any sample; Mermaid graph.

required.name: Clubs index
required.description: Index of clubs; sourcebook reference; external links.

required.name: Solver club
required.description: Solver, tempo fixation, equations; standard of record link.

required.name: Dispatcher club
required.description: Dispatcher, event manager, equation, code ref, quad stream.

required.name: Events club
required.description: Event manager, integration flow, demo callbacks.

required.name: Analysis club
required.description: Analyzed sample, duration, tempo, beat detection, heavenfalls; external links.

required.name: Main app: accepted WS server for saving project edits
required.description: Main app must have an accepted WebSocket server to save additional edits for a project (whichever project). Dark scheduling; response text space (append-only).

other_improvising_standards: Additional improvising standards may be added to the required array; each will be recorded for its entirety.
